Public Sub DeleteByName (name As String, forceDeletionTypes As String)

Docs.param: the name of the resource to delete
The resource types you want to force delete. Currently, only the following is supported: Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines,Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachineScaleSets
Docs.summary: Deletes a resource from Azure, identifying it by its resource name.
